column2: select top # * from crimes_norm order by _id,crime  ), bb as ( SELECT    _id,   STUFF((     SELECT &&& + crime      FROM aa      WHERE (_id = Results._id)      FOR XML PATH(&&&),TYPE).value(&&&,&&&)   ,#,#,&&&) AS crimes FROM aa Results GROUP BY _ID having count(*) > #   ) select distinct crimes from bb   order by #
